name: kirbyboom
description:
when playing this game you must use the arrow keys (left right up and down) these will let you move/jump.

the aim of the game is to get a high score  by doing this you must collect the coins (gold silver and bronze) you will also need to collect the tokens with the heart on them this is a life. once finishing the game you must run through the purple portal and this will take you to the next level.

you must avoid falling into the empty floor as this will make you die and lose a life once all your lives are gone you will then be taken to the start screen to replay

in this game there are three levels going from easy to harder although this is still level three it is still easy.
